thread.title: Sunset Over the Island of Montserrat
thread.title_full: Sunset Over the Island of Montserrat

author: Gary
title: Sunset Over the Island of Montserrat
text:
Sunset Over the Island of Montserrat 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/22 Exposure Time 1/25 
Montserrat isnâ€™t the most popular island in the Caribbean, however, it is one of the most interesting. A British territory, it suffered from a massive volcanic eruption 1997. The volcano destroyed the capital city of Plymouth and rendered 2/3 of the island uninhabitable. 
The population of the island is now only 1/3 the size it was pre eruption as most of the population migrated to the UK or nearby Antigua. 
The volcano is still active and you can visit the Montserrat Volcano Observatory to see how they are watching for the next eruption. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
